response.overview: She Ate That! follows Devorah, a NY Jewish woman stuck juggling between what means more to her, her religion, or an important job opportunity. Devorah has to endure a plethora of obstacles set up by Madeline, the intimidating editor-in-chief of Girl Crush Magazine, with her sidekick Remi while also competing with Tansy, a confident applicant for the same position. Will the pressure of this golden opportunity get to Devorah? Remember, Hashem (God) is watching!
response.tagline: A 20-something NY Jewish woman realizes the pivotal lunchen for a coveted job falls on Yom Kippur; will she consume food on the holiest of Jewish holidays (oy vey!) or risk losing the opportunity?
response.title: She Ate That!
